mapper.insert: insert into qna_reply (bno, id, rno, reply) values (#{bno}, #{id}, qna_reply_seq.nextval , #{reply})
mapper.select: select * from qna_reply where rno > 0 order by rno desc
mapper.delete: delete qna_reply where rno = #{rno} and id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id from qna_reply where id = #{id}
